website_summaries.verdict: Miniature solar fan that's just the right size for a dog house or a chicken coop.
pros: Very low price for a solar powered fan
Made for small enclosures where you need a minimal amount of air movement, such as a treehouse or dog house
Runs quietly, so it won't spook pets or bother you while sleeping
cons: Not made to be carried by hand

customer_reviews.title: Great solar powered fan
customer_reviews.text: First couple of days I had this up in the greenhouse I was wondering if it even worked but then perhaps I was expecting a bit much from a solar panel in November so plugged it into an iPhone charge. It turns and moves the air, but I wouldn’t be looking for this to move air in even a half decent sized room. Checked the solar panel on a sunny day (helps right?) and it powers the fan. Suitable for what I want, but don’t expect a strong breeze. I could possibly fart faster, but it will certainly do for my greenhouse..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good vent fan for my boat cabin.
customer_reviews.text: I put it in one of the windows on my boats cutty cabin. The fan is not that strong but good enough to change the air so it doesn't become moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Merando

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The solar cell that came with the unit doesn't generate enough power to run the fan unless it is face DIRECTLY at the sun thus making it useless as a solar power fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Plug & Play
customer_reviews.text: Works Perfect with direct sunlight mounted on our shed Note: Fan Power Cable is NOT sunlight resistant and needs to be concealed.
customer_reviews.author: Warea

customer_reviews.title: It’s small.
customer_reviews.text: It is TINY. Just be cautious of that. When Mounted with direct sun it does move the air in my greenhouse but it’s really not a strong enough fan for my needs. It would be better to cool off a computer then a space
customer_reviews.author: syracusefan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This fan didn't work unless plugged into a usb port.
customer_reviews.author: sean conyers

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Fan does not work and was leaking oil all over the box. Solar panel had hot glue around the control box as if it was fixed and sold as new. Solar panel in full light does not spin the fan. The fan had a weird noise as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elon Musk

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working within 24 hours. I had ordered two more when it came in, because it was what I needed. I tried to cancel that order later that same day, but it said that it had already shipped with a deliver date two months out. Don't order from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very slow moving and not what I expected,does not move air very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The two parts do not work as a whole.
customer_reviews.text: Photo cell did produce a charge and the fan did run on a different power source but the photo cell would not run the fan no matter how much direct sunlight it received.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not well suited for things they claimed
customer_reviews.text: The fan will never do in a hen house, does not push enough air to blowout match. Misrepresented on air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Lovey

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Pad not strong enough to power fan an USB didn't work. Waste of time an money
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kroll

customer_reviews.title: Very good and very fast to arrive
customer_reviews.text: Works well straight out of the box, simple set-up. Have it in my greenhouse, currently pouring with rain but enough light for it to spin.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for one day
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a promising addition to my greenhouse but unfortunately the fan functioned for only 24 hours. I’d suggest looking for a higher quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen D.

customer_reviews.title: bad product do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The solar panel is insufficient to power the fan and a total waste of money. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: njoleynik

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately did not work :-(
customer_reviews.text: This was most likely opened before. No directions included. The parts were all there, however the fan did not work. I am returning and going to purchase a dual solar powered fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12V panel, 18V fan! Dumb.
customer_reviews.text: Solar panel puts out 12 volts. Fan is rated at 18 volts!!!!!!! No workie. No way!!! 'Nuff" said.....
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: solar panel is generating power indicated by the LED lighting up, but the fan has never even tried to move. This has been left in the direct sunlight mid day for hours with no blade rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Direct sun is key!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a little shed vent. Mounted the panel along the outside capping then ran the wire through the siding and plywood. Caulked the holes shut and plugged the fan in. Definitely helps to keep air cycling and pull the heat out, just don’t expect 60mph winds from this beast and it’s awesome! Direct sun vs shaded sun will definitely hinder its operating speeds also.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: So not thrilled with this fan at all. Even with the solar panel directly in the sun, it won’t work without manually spinning it. And it gives almost no ventilation. It also came with zero instructions. Like no paper at all.
customer_reviews.author: Msjska

customer_reviews.title: Decent airflow.
customer_reviews.text: Decent airflow for a shed. I added a 4 inch dryer vent and took out the flapper.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool I am ordering more
customer_reviews.text: I set this little guy in my green house, so far it's been good.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Raul Alberto Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Too small it doesn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t even spin fast enough to make a difference. Cheap and not worth you’re time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Got for greenhouse and barley moves a tiny amount of air. Couldn't tell it was on a foot away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Black

customer_reviews.title: No worth anything
customer_reviews.text: The fan moves very little air and I’m not sure what’s good this van does anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Bigma

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of blowing power
customer_reviews.text: Not much blowing power, does not always start up, you need to spin it to go, finally dropped some lubricant and works better but not a lot of blowing power
customer_reviews.author: B. Kawabe

product_meta.title: ShareTime 10W Solar Powered Fan Mini Ventilator for Greenhouse Pet Dog Chicken House Cooling
product_meta.description:
Color:10W

Solar Powered Fan Mini Ventilator for Dog/Chicken House Greenhouse RV Roof

Specifications : 
Condition:New 
Solar Panel:10W 
Fan Max Air Flow: 47.3 CFM 
Fan Size:4.6"*4.6" 
Power: USB,Not chargeable 
Material:Iron 
Wire Length: 45 CM . 

Features : 
1. Outdoor solar panels,cen effectively convert sunlight into electricity. 
2. Clean energy,long life span and energy saving. 
3. Maintains comfortable temperature level for your journey. 
4. Suitable for greenhouse,pet house,tree house,and RV car,etc. 
5. Keeps air clean,it can help you eliminate the smell of pets,tobacco,etc。 

Package Included: 
1pc solar pannel（Comes with USB output） 
1pc Fan 
1pc Cigarette lighter 
1pc DC alligator clip output line 

Notes : 
The solar cell surface of the solar panel faces the sun, and the USB output surface on the back displays a red light, indicating that the current output is normal. 
Connect the mated DC alligator clip line, and the alligator clip output DC voltage 12v. The positive and negative crocodile clips cannot be connected or touched during use, which may cause short-term heat or burn the line. 
NOTE:The actual standard is 12V, the fan is marked with a virtual standard 18V, and 18V is a universal voltage, so the label is not changed. 

Q&A : 
When your fan stops, how can you check it? 
1.make sure the connector is plugged in tightly. 
2.Put them under direct sunlight to observe whether the red light is on(please make sure that the solar panel is facing up and can receive sunlight). 
3.try to connect the fan through the other two wires in the package to see if the fan is working. 
4.If you encounter areas that need improvement during use, you can send us feedback via email, and I will reply as soon as possible.
feature_bullets: USB Cooling fan powered by solar panel; Package includes 1 piece solar panel + 1 piece USB fan.
Portable, Small Size, Easy to carry around. No Batteries Needed, 100% Silent and Green energy, great for environment.
The solar panel runs the fan fast under direct sunshine.the solar Fan will working more slow or stops working when the sunshine is weak. Our fan is special solar and working with our plan is faster.
Solar Powered Fan Ventilator for Pet house, Chicken house, Tree house, Dog house, Greenhouse, RV, Touring Car, Camping and etc.
100% money back guarantee. If you have any problem with your solar fan, simply contact us with your order ID and you will receive a full refund or replacement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars73 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
